attributes.additional_details:
The sale of Channel 4 will make a very minimal difference to government income. 
It currently costs the tax payer nothing. 
It's programmes are produced by independent UK companies, which provide lots of UK jobs all over the UK.
attributes.background: Leave Channel 4 as it is now.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613995
